texasholdem

Class HandAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdem.HandAnalyzer

  • public class HandAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the brains of the computer players in a texas holdem poker game. It will base it's decision on the player's cards, the community cards, and how many chips the players have.
    Author:
    John Wardell
